					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770426
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770426"
	picture = "Dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

#	Set Probability Variables

	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = 15
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

		any_country = {
			limit = {

		}

			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

#		No option to ask other victors if 1 victor

country_event = {
    id = 777770429
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770429"
	picture = "Dismantle 13"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770800
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770800"
	picture = "Dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
    }
}

    id = 777770802
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770802"
	picture = "Dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

#	Set Probability Variables

	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = 15
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}

			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770803
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770803"
	picture = "Dismantle 1"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

#	Set Probability Variables

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770804
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770804"
	picture = "Dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes


	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

#		No option to ask other victors if 1 victor

country_event = {
    id = 777770805
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770805"

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770807
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770807"
	picture = "dismantle 22"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

##### 0440-0449	Primary Effect Bouncing Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770440
    title = "Our freedom is being considered?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770440"
	picture = "Dismantle 11"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770456
		}

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770474
		}
    }
}

##### 0450-0479	Primary Victor Response Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770450
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770450"
	picture = "dismantle 11"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430

		any_country = {

			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to exist!"

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "No, We also dont care about $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
		name = "We suggest our own plans for $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		badboy = 0.1
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 0 }
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770453
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770453"
	picture = "dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }

			}

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770455
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770455"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ should be thier puppet!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ deserves something else!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {

				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}

			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

		any_country = {

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
