				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be free!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to be free!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770461
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770461"
	picture = "dismantle 11"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		}

				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

				tag = FROM

			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We have our own plans for $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 }
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770463
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770463"
	picture = "dismantle 5"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be as is!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770465
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770465"
	picture = "dismantle 9"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ should be integrated!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ not should have been integrated!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432

			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }

        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to exist!"
		random_country = {

				value = -50

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432

				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should NOT exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }

country_event = {
    id = 777770473
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770473"
	picture = "dismantle 16"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ should not get land!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}

    id = 777770474
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770474"
	picture = "dismantle 24"

    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores Should be thiers!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores should not be annexed!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

##### 0480-0489	Secondary First Wave Bounce Events (Ai) #####


country_event = {
    id = 777770480
    title = "Is this what freedom feels like?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770480"
	picture = "dismantle 1"
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777770490
		}
	}
}

##### 0490-0499	Secondary Victor Leading Decision Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770490
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770490"
	picture = "dismantle 1"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770491
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770491"
	picture = "dismantle 2"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
    }
}

		}

##### 0510-0519	Secondary Effect Bouncing Evenets #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770510
    title = "Our freedom is being considered?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770510"
	picture = "dismantle 1"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				has_global_flag = Total_Eight_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770520
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770520
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770520
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770474
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770474
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770474
		}
	}
}

##### 0520-0549	Secondary Victor Response Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770520
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770520"
	picture = "dismantle 7"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

				tag = FROM

				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770501
		}
    }

##### 0550-0559	Effect Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770550
    title = "Released from Dismantlement!"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770550"
	picture = "dismantle 3"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Yes!"
		UTI = { civilized = yes }
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
				OR = {
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } }
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
			THIS = { set_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { is_core = UTI is_core = THIS } remove_core = THIS add_core = CLN }
				release = UTI
				UTI = { annex_to = UTI any_owned = { limit = { is_core = CLN } add_core = THIS remove_core = CLN } all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				THIS = { has_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this }
				check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 }
			}
			THIS = { clr_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this }
			inherit = UTI
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				THIS = { has_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			THIS = { clr_country_flag = dont_be_weird_about_this }
			inherit = UTI
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = yes } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = yes }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = no } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = no }
			}
		}
		UTI = { civilized = no }
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

    id = 777770551
    title = "Nothing from Dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770551"

    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "whoop whoop not chungus"
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770552
    title = "Independent from Dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770552"
	picture = "dismantle 5"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Heroic Victory"
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release_vassal = FROM
        }
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release_vassal = FROM
        }
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770553
    title = "We are still a puppet!"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770553"
	picture = "dismantle 1"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Damn"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 0.99 } }
			}
			create_vassal = FROM
			set_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 0.99 } }
			}
			create_vassal = FROM
		}
		clr_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				overlord = { government = proletarian_dictatorship }
				OR = {
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			government = proletarian_dictatorship

		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				overlord = { government = fascist_dictatorship }
				OR = {
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			government = fascist_dictatorship

		}
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 777770554
    title = "New lands from Dismantlement!"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770554"
	picture = "dismantle 2"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Yes!"
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = yes } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = yes }
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 0.99 } }
			}
			create_vassal = FROM
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = no } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770556
    title = "Annexation from Dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777770556"
	picture = "dismantle 4"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "whoop whoop not chungus"
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } }
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } }
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = yes } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = yes }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = no } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = no }
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { OR = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			inherit = FROM
			set_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { OR = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			inherit = FROM
		}
		clr_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

			CZH = { set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 } }
			CZH = { inherit = FROM }
			FROM = { all_core = { add_core = CZH } }
		}
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

##### 1100-1199 & 1200-1299  Custom Formables Bounce Events & Puppet Custom Formables Bounce Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777771100
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771100"
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
    }
}
