country_event = {
    id = 777771103
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771103"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772603
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772203
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771303
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772803
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772403
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772003
		}
    }

			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772406
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }

				}
			}

country_event = {
    id = 777771209
    title = "We may be freed by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771209"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772709
		}
		any_country = {

				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }

				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}

		}

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772312
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771412
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772912
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772512
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }

country_event = {
    id = 777771113
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771113"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772613
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772213
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771313
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772813
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772413
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772013
		}
    }

			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772815
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772415

    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement"

					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772618
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772218
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771318
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor

				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772818
		}

				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }

country_event = {
    id = 777771218
    title = "We may be freed by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771218"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772718
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772318
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771418
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772918
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772518
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772118
		}
    }
}

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772720
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772320
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771420
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772920
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772520
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772120
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771121
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771121"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772622
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772222
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771322
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772822
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772422
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772022
		}

##### 1300-1399 & 1400-1499	Custom Formables Decision Events & Puppet Formables Decision Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777771303
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771303"
	picture = "dismantle 2"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Bulgaria-Romania (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = BGR }
            set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
            country_event = 777770430
        }
		BGR = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 BGR = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Hungary-Romania (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = HUR }
            set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_Two value = 1 }
            country_event = 777770430
        }

country_event = {
    id = 777771403
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771403"
	picture = "dismantle 18"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}

				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}

			}

		}

		}

				tag = FROM

				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }

        }

    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Czechoslovakia (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = CZH }
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		CZH = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 CZH = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771405
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771405"
	picture = "dismantle 5"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Czechoslovakia"
		FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = CZH }
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		CZH = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 CZH = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

    id = 777771306
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771306"
	picture = "dismantle 2"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {

			country_event = 777770430
		}

    id = 777771406
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771406"
	picture = "dismantle 20"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}

		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the United Baltic Provinces"
		FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = UBD }
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		UBD = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 UBD = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the Intermarium"
        FROM = {
		   all_core = { add_core = PLR }
           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_Two value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }
		PLR = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PLR = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771307
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777771307"
	picture = "dismantle 8"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {

			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }

		}

			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5

			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430

			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }

		FROM = {

			country_event = 777770430

		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars

		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }

           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }

            factor = 5

    id = 777771407

    is_triggered_only = yes
