    id = 777772312
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772312"
	picture = "dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772213
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772213"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the Peru-Bolivian Confederation (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
		   all_core = { add_core = PBC }
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PBC = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

    id = 777772313
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772313"
	picture = "dismantle 7"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the North German Confederation (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = NGF }
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 NGF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772314
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772314"
	picture = "dismantle 8"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the North German Confederation"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = NGF }
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 NGF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }

    id = 777772215
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772215"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the South German Confederation"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = SGF }
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 SGF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772216
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772216"
	picture = "dismantle 20"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }

			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {

		FROM = {

			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Italy (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = ITA }
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 ITA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }

	picture = "dismantle 16"

    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Transcaucasia (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = TCA }
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 TCA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772317
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772317"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}

			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}

				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}

        ai_chance = {

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }

    }
    option = {

    id = 777772218
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772218"
	picture = "dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		}

				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    id = 777772318
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772318"
	picture = "dismantle 16"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the United States of Central America"
        FROM = {
			all_core = { add_core = UCA }
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 UCA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772219
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772219"
	picture = "dismantle 4"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		}

				tag = FROM

			}

		}

			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}

				tag = FROM

					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }

			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {

			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join China (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 30
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }

			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 CHI = { exists = yes } }
        }

    is_triggered_only = yes

    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM

				any_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the Western United States (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PAC = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772222
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "EVTDESC777772222"
	picture = "dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = radical_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}

		}

			}

		}

           country_event = 777770430
